utACK modulo the autofile fix which is redundant.

Generally I think it is a good idea to add `assert(â€¦)`:s where it helps static analyzers understand the code better. It makes implicit assumptions explicit which helps static analyzers and humans alike to understand and reason about the code.

My experience is that if a code path makes a static analyzer confused it is very likely to be con
Removed redundant file close as requested, thanks for the reviews :)
Can you please change the title to `Add nullptr assertions` or such? The current title is incorrect, as adding assertions does not *fix* anything.
This is an autofile - it closes automatically on release. So this is redundant.\nThe only reason for closing it explicitly below is because of the `RenameOver` after.
Maybe remove explicit close and move `fileout` to an inner scope?
